Other Information.Test Conditions: 1.8 to 300 K, up to 689 kPa CO2 pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: Gate-opening transition occurs at loadings higher than a threshold value between 0.29 and 0.56 mol of CO2 per mol of ZIF-8.

Sieving Mechanism: Gate opening and linker swinging at low temperatures

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Broad anomaly from 70 to 220 K observed for samples with at least 0.56 mol of CO2 per mol of ZIF-8

Other Information.Additional Info: First thermodynamic evidence of a gate-opening transition in ZIF-8 induced by sorbed CO2.
